description: List posts with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Users can list posts they created, and published posts that appear in their user post feed; other posts are not included in the non-admin scope.
validation_notes: Filters are combined with AND logic. status must be one of: draft, published. post-type must be one of: basic, notification, action, new_membership, post_summary, post_activity, objective_status, objective_completion, objective_status_scoreboard, objective_sales_responsible_person_assignment_issues, key_result_completion, key_result_status_scoreboard, key_result_customer_success_responsible_person_assignment_issues, job_production_plan_recap, job_production_plan_material_site_start_timing, customer_daily_job_production_plan_recap, customer_job_production_plan_schedule, customer_lineup_schedule, material_supplier_production_daily_recap, material_supplier_production_monthly_recap, trucker_shift_summary, trucking_time_card_administration_report_card, trucking_tender_acceptance_report_card, driver_day_recap, release_note_summary, proffer. published-at-min and published-at-max must be dates in YYYY-MM-DD format. subject-post accepts a comma-separated list of post IDs. creator must be in the format Type|ID (e.g., User|123).

flags.name: --post-type
flags.validation: One of: basic, notification, action, new_membership, post_summary, post_activity, objective_status, objective_completion, objective_status_scoreboard, objective_sales_responsible_person_assignment_issues, key_result_completion, key_result_status_scoreboard, key_result_customer_success_responsible_person_assignment_issues, job_production_plan_recap, job_production_plan_material_site_start_timing, customer_daily_job_production_plan_recap, customer_job_production_plan_schedule, customer_lineup_schedule, material_supplier_production_daily_recap, material_supplier_production_monthly_recap, trucker_shift_summary, trucking_time_card_administration_report_card, trucking_tender_acceptance_report_card, driver_day_recap, release_note_summary, proffer.

flags.name: --published-at-max
flags.description: Filter to posts published on or before this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --published-at-min
flags.description: Filter to posts published on or after this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --subject-post
flags.description: Filter by subject post ID (comma-separated for multiple)
